objects.text:
• One-Touch Operation
• 6-Cup Capacity
• Auto Keep-Warm Function
• Versatile Cooking Options

AROMA 6-Cup Rice Cooker
Simple • Convenient • Reliable

product_details.description: "Enjoy easy home cooking with the AROMA 6-Cup (Cooked) Pot-Style Rice Cooker. Restaurant-quality rice. Healthy meals. Delicious one-pot dishes. Prepare all this and more at the flip of a switch! Aroma takes the cook out of home cooking - turning kitchen time into your time! Help the kids with homework, get creative at play time or pick up that novel you've been waiting to dive into. All while delivering hot, hearty and healthy meals the entire family will love.This convenient cooker's compact capacity perfectly cooks 2 to 6 cups of any variety of rice. Once the rice has finished, it will automatically switch to Keep-Warm so there's no need for monitoring or stirring. It's also perfect for oatmeal, chili, jambalaya, soups and so much more! And when the cooking is done, the inner cooking pot and all accessories remove for easy cleanup in the dishwasher." Perfectly prepares 2 to 6 cups of any variety of cooked rice Simple, one-touch operation with automatic Keep-Warm Great for soups, jambalaya, chili and so much more! Full-view tempered glass lid Easy-to-clean, nonstick removable inner pot Includes Rice Measuring Cup and Serving Spatula Brand - AROMA ** Capacity - 6 Cups ** Product Dimensions - 8.13"D x 8.9"W x 8"H ** Power Source - Corded Electric ** Product Care Instructions - Hand Wash **

banner_details:
This banner presents a clean and modern layout ideal for promoting a kitchen appliance. The background features a smooth, diagonal gradient from light cream to soft beige, overlaid with abstract circular accents and subtle horizontal wave lines for visual interest. The main product image is centered to the right, showcasing a rice cooker with high clarity. Large bold typography is used for the main message, with “heading_1” and “heading_2” stacked vertically in dark brown and orange hues respectively, capturing attention. The “tagline” sits just below the heading, followed by bullet-point highlights in the “description” section. “price” is emphasized in a larger dark brown font, accompanied by a bright orange “cta_background” with a white “cta” for action. A final “subheading” text provides product details in smaller font at the bottom. The design utilizes clear font hierarchies and well-balanced spacing for readability and aesthetic appeal.

**Color Palette:**
- Warm Cream (#FFF9F0)
- Soft Beige (#F0E4D5)
- Rich Brown (#5D4037)
- Vibrant Orange (#D98E3F)
- Soft Accent Brown (#B55A25)
- Pure White (#FFFFFF)
product_color: The product image features a sleek and modern rice cooker designed with a minimalistic color palette. Dominant colors include crisp white (#FFFFFF) for the body, emphasizing cleanliness and simplicity, and matte black (#2D2D2D) on the lid rim and base, adding contrast and sophistication. The lid's translucent gray glass (#A9A9A9) subtly blends with the black, giving depth and focus. Accent colors like amber-orange (#F5A623) for “WARM” and deep red (#D0021B) for “COOK” buttons highlight functionality and guide user interaction. These colors are well-balanced; highlights draw attention while the monochrome base enhances readability and cleanliness in design.
